author: hwright
msg: Use the library-internal prop getting function place of a public API.

the database stashed in the edit baton.

author: hwright
msg: Add an iterpool, update calls to out-dated APIs, and other sundry wc-ng-related
cleanups in the working copy update editor.
(close_directory, close_file): Use our library-internal propget function.
about rev'ing the API in the future.
(check_wc_root): Remove the early out for going beyond the wcroot, since
we have an abspath.  Also, use the local_abspath throughout.
Use an abspath to call check_wc_root().
